## Serialize with Python
```{python}
from base64 import b64encode
from v8serialize import dumps
from v8serialize.jstypes import JSObject

serialized = dumps(JSObject(message="Hello World"))
b64encode(serialized).decode()
```

## Deserialize with Python
```{python}
from base64 import b64decode
from v8serialize import loads

serialized = b64decode("/w9vUwdtZXNzYWdlUwtIZWxsbyBXb3JsZHsB")
loads(serialized)
```


## Serialize with Node.js / Deno

```javascript
import * as v8 from 'node:v8';

const buffer = v8.serialize({message: 'Hello World'});
console.log(buffer.toString('base64'));
```
```
/w9vIgdtZXNzYWdlIgtIZWxsbyBXb3JsZHsB
```

## Deserialize with Node.js / Deno

```javascript
import * as v8 from 'node:v8';

const buffer = Buffer.from('/w9vIgdtZXNzYWdlIgtIZWxsbyBXb3JsZHsB', 'base64');
console.log(v8.deserialize(buffer));
```
```
{ message: 'Hello World' }
```
